channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: hacking (6.0.1)
item.description: OpenStack Hacking Guideline Enforcement
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (2.4)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-aaa (0.14.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks Python tests follow the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-prometheus-metrics-name (0.1.11)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for prometheus metric name validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bas (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 extension that checks for blank lines around (compound) statements.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: autohooks-plugin-flake8 (23.4)
item.description: An autohooks plugin for python code linting via flake8.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-keyword-params (1.1.1)
item.description: Flake8 keyword parameter validation

item.title: Updated: flake8-dunder-all (0.3)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin and pre-commit hook which checks to ensure modules have defined '__all__'.

item.title: Updated: flake8-django (1.2)
item.description: Plugin to catch bad style specific to Django Projects.

item.title: Updated: ignore-flake8-error (0.2)
item.description: add `noqa` comments to ignore every occurrence of a flake8 error
